expo.name: SubaFun
expo.description:
An educational app that uses scaffolding strategies to teach early numeracy skills. Spanish vocabulary and Klingon Vocabulary are included to show proof of concept of applying the same strategies to a diverse set of skills.

Features:
Subitizing (1-9)
Five Frames (0-5)
Spanish Words (~2000)
Klingon Nouns (~200)
